params._maxValues: The max values for the poll
params._treeDepths: The depths of the merkle trees

deploy(uint256,(uint256,uint256),(uint8,.notice: Deploy a new Poll contract and AccQueue contract for messages.

userdoc.notice: A factory contract which deploys Poll contracts. It allows the MACI contract size to stay within the limit set by EIP-170.
